description: This file serves as the main entry point for a Flutter-based healthcare management application. It initializes environment variables, sets up dependency injection via providers, and constructs the root widget tree, including authentication management and routing.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget for the Flutter healthcare app, managing app state with multiple providers.

classes.name: _MyAppState
classes.description: State class for MyApp, initializes dependencies and builds the widget tree.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree, providing various app-wide providers for state management.
